title: Stylish 5-Bedroom Duplex with Sauna in Vibrant Pradnik Bialy
description: Experience urban comfort and spacious living in this contemporary 5-bedroom, 3-bath duplex located in the sought-after Pradnik Bialy district. Spread across 178 sqm, the duplex blends modern design with functional luxury, featuring bright open-plan living and dining areas perfect for entertaining. Make the most of the extra amenities with a private sauna and integrated storage throughout via built-in wardrobes. Enjoy tranquil evenings with access to the residential swimming pool—ideal after a productive day.
neighborhood_description: Pradnik Bialy offers a dynamic environment favored by young professionals and creative types, fuelled by its proximity to the riverside and blossoming artistic enclave. Convenient public transport and highway connections make navigating Krakow or heading out of town a breeze. Nearby, find shopping, eclectic dining options, and esteemed local schools—all within reach for an elevated lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for co-living or rental model
close to schools and art centers
target_buyer: The ideal buyer is an investor seeking reliable rental income and long-term appreciation potential, or urban professionals looking for a co-living solution in one of Krakow’s up-and-coming locales.
market_positioning: Strategically positioned for investors, this property stands out due to its versatile layout, luxury amenities, and proximity to major transit corridors and lifestyle destinations—offering excellent rental demand and potential for future value growth in Krakow’s competitive property market.
